definition: Proterozoic (geological era 2500-540m years ago)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
ancient/old/paleo-
surname Gu
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: At present, the age of storm deposits reported in China may be traced back to late proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 目前我國已報導的風暴沉積時代可追溯到晚元古代。

sentences.english: The plate activity in Tianshan can be traced back to Middle and Late proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 天山地區的板塊活動可以追溯到中晚元古代。

sentences.english: The Xiushui Formation of Mid Proterozoic Shuangqiaoshan Group is widely distributed in North Jiangxi .
sentences.chinese: 贛北地區中元古代雙橋山羣修水組廣泛出露。

sentences.english: Wangjiawaizi gold deposit occurs in Lower Proterozoic opimetamorphic rock series.
sentences.chinese: 王家崴子金礦牀賦存於遼南古元古代淺變質岩系中。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the features of late Middle Proterozoic active continental margin in South China.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述了華南中元古代晚期活動陸緣特徵。

sentences.english: The basement of EKOB formed in late Paleo-Proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 東崑崙造山帶基底主要形成於古元古代晚期。

sentences.english: Wangjiawaizi gold deposit occurrs in Lower Proterozoic opimetamorphic rock series.
sentences.chinese: 王家崴子金礦牀賦存於遼南古元古代淺變質岩系中。

sentences.english: As only one kind of fossil in Proterozoic, stromatolite is an important material in the paleogeography changing study.
sentences.chinese: 元古代疊層石是研究古地理變化的重要材料。

sentences.english: Early Proterozoic high-pressure metamorphism in the Wutaishan.
sentences.chinese: 五臺山早元古代高壓變質作用研究。

sentences.english: The mineralization epoch is the early period of mesoproterozoic Era.
sentences.chinese: 成礦時代爲中元古代早期。

definition: Archaeozoic (geological era before 2500m years ago)
Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
Archaean (geological eon before 2500m years ago)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
pre-Cambrian (geological eon 2500-645m)
Sinian (c. 800-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era
Holocene (geological period covering approx 12000 years since the last ice age)
Triassic (geological period 250-205m years ago)
Phanerozoic, geological eon lasting since the Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪[Han2 wu3 ji4], c. 540m year ago
fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
Carboniferous (geological period 354-292m years ago)
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
Devonian (geological period 417-354m years ago)
Silurian (geological period 440-417m years ago)
Permian (geological period 292-250m years ago)/also written 二疊紀|二叠纪
Miocene (geological epoch from 24m-5m years ago)
